subject: Problem while running junit
msgSnippet: hi... Iam using the JUnit version3.8.1  to test the Struts application version1.2.2,while testing my action class which consist of database connectivity its
messageBody:
hi... Iam using the JUnit version3.8.1 to test the Struts application
version1.2.2,while testing my action class which consist of database
connectivity its throwing an
error:junit.framework.assertionfailederror:Initialising application
data source.Iam specifying the database connectivity in
struts-config.xml by doing this i got the above said error,but if i
specify the same database connectivity in the action class i wont get
any error.I want to know whats the problem behind specifying the
database connectivity in struts-config.xml while using the junit...?i
use the strutstest-2.1.3. jar for testing the struts application with
junit....
